answers.answer: Hi,We thankfully are in a time where we have many medications available for treating diabetes,so you have several other options if you are having side effects while on metformin. The choice will depend on other aspects of your health however so I cannot simply recommend one without knowing your history. This is one to speak with your doctor at length about at your next appointment.  Overall your A1C is good, so atleast you are on a good track with your diabetes overall.Take care.
